revised_title: Quantal Calculation of Photo-Ionization Cross-Section of Atomic Potassium
tldr: The authors investigate the photo-ionization of atomic potassium using quantal methods, focusing on the sensitivity of the cross-section to the wave functions employed. They find that the experimental results can be reproduced using acceptable wave functions, and discuss the main features of the cross-section-energy curve. The calculated photo-ionization cross-sections for atomic potassium with various assumed polarizabilities are provided in a table.
